title: Ep 85: Hair is Hair with Hair Stylist Vernon Francois
itunes:title: Ep 85: Hair is Hair with Hair Stylist Vernon Francois
itunes:subtitle: Hairstylist Vernon Francois talks about living with dyslexia, growing up as a redhead, products for textured hair, and why you should never do your hair angry. Prepare for an epic conversation! Before that: We talk stretch marks, dirty hairbrushes, and...
description:
Hairstylist Vernon Francois talks about living with dyslexia, growing up as a redhead, products for textured hair, and why you should never do your hair angry. Prepare for an epic conversation! Before that: We talk stretch marks, dirty hairbrushes, and Kim Kardashian West's new fragrance. 

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
